name: Fampla
subtitle: Self-Hosted Family Organization
description: Complete family organization platform with calendar, shopping lists, recipes, and todos. Self-hosted for complete privacy.

apps.name: Fampla
apps.subtitle: Family Organization Platform
apps.localizedDescription:
🐝 Complete self-hosted family organization platform

✨ Features:
• 📅 Smart Calendar with automatic ToDo generation
• 🛒 Collaborative Shopping Lists with real-time sync
• 📖 Recipe Management with ingredient selection
• 📋 Intelligent ToDo System
• 👥 Family Management with role-based access
• 🔐 Secure authentication
• 🏠 Real-time activity dashboard

🔧 Self-Hosted:
• Complete privacy with your own server
• Docker deployment ready
• No external dependencies
• Username-based sharing system

versions.localizedDescription:
📅 Calendar UI Improvements

✅ Light Mode Fixes:
• Fixed unreadable appointment text in light mode
• All calendar text now properly adapts to light/dark themes
• Improved calendar event visibility across all lighting conditions
• Enhanced appointment time and title readability

🗓️ Calendar Display Fixes:
• Fixed incomplete calendar month display
• Calendar now properly shows all days through month end
• Increased calendar grid height for full 6-week view
• Improved calendar day cell aspect ratio and layout

🎨 UI/UX Improvements:
• Better theme-responsive text colors throughout calendar
• Enhanced calendar navigation and date selection
• Improved glass card design consistency
• Optimized calendar grid spacing and dimensions

🎯 Version 1.3.3 - AltStore Update Fix

✅ Features from 1.3.2:
• 🎨 Color coding for ToDos (same as Notes)
• 🔄 Recurring event detection with auto-todo prevention
• 📝 Real-time Notes display updates
• 🐛 Fixed compilation errors

📅 Recurring Calendar Events:
• Recurring calendar events with flexible scheduling
• Birthdays that repeat yearly automatically
• Weekly activities with custom duration (e.g., 4-week swimming course)
• Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly recurrence options
• German localization for recurrence descriptions
• Smart end date and occurrence limit controls

🔄 AltStore Compatibility:
• Version increment to enable AltStore updates
• Fixed update detection issues

🎯 Version 1.3.2 - Complete Feature Update

✅ New Features:
• 🎨 Color coding for ToDos (same as Notes)
• 🔄 Recurring event detection with auto-todo prevention
• 📝 Real-time Notes display updates
• 🐛 Fixed compilation errors

📅 Recurring Calendar Events:
• Recurring calendar events with flexible scheduling
• Birthdays that repeat yearly automatically
• Weekly activities with custom duration (e.g., 4-week swimming course)
• Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly recurrence options
• German localization for recurrence descriptions
• Smart end date and occurrence limit controls

🔧 Technical Improvements:
• Enhanced CalendarEvent model with recurrence fields
• Database schema updates for recurring events
• RecurrenceType enum with user-friendly descriptions
• Utility methods for generating recurring instances
• Parent-child relationship for event instances
• Performance optimizations with proper indexing

🚀 User Experience:
• Intuitive recurrence setup in calendar
• Clear descriptions like 'Wöchentlich (4 Mal)'
• Automatic generation of recurring event instances
• Better calendar organization for repeating events

🎯 Dashboard Improvements

✅ Real Data Integration:
• Fixed ManualTodo integration - no more property errors
• Removed all static fake messages from dashboard
• Dashboard now shows real todo data from your account
• Added time-based greetings and icons (morning/evening)
• Real-time todo counting and display
• Shows actual upcoming tasks instead of placeholder text

🔧 Technical Fixes:
• Fixed assignedToUserId property usage
• Fixed sharingType enum handling
• Proper Consumer<ManualTodoProvider> integration
• Improved dashboard data synchronization
• Enhanced todo provider state management

🚀 User Experience:
• Dynamic greeting messages based on time of day
• Real task counting and progress indicators
• Authentic family activity overview
• Better loading states and error handling

🚀 Major Performance Update

• Smart Caching System reduces API requests by 90%
• No more rate limiting issues with tab switching
• Fixed recipe deletion functionality
• Resolved image loading issues
• Improved mobile performance
• Enhanced Provider state management
• Added emergency rate limit reset functionality
• Fixed backend database operations

🎯 Initial Release

• Complete rebranding from FamilyHive to Fampla
• Modern Glass Card UI design system
• Enhanced username-based sharing
• Production-ready Docker deployment
• GitHub Container Registry integration
• Smart calendar with ToDo generation
• Collaborative shopping lists
• Recipe management system
• Family role management
